tribe_name: Cahto Tribe of the Laytonville Rancheria

awards.recipient_name_raw: CAHTO TRIBE OF THE LAYTONVILLE RANCHERIA
CAHTO TRIBE OF THE LAYTONVILLE RANCHERIA
awards.description: THIS COOPERATIVE AGREEMENT PROVIDES FUNDING TO DEVELOP THE CAHTO TRIBE OF LAYTONVILLE RANCHERIA'S ENVIRONMENTAL PROGRAM. ACTIVITIES INCLUDE MANAGING THE ENVIRONMENTAL OFFICE, FINALIZING A SOLID WASTE ORDINANCE, DEVELOPING AN AIR PROGRAM, CONSULTING WITH STATE AND FEDERAL AGENCIES, DRAFTING AN EMERGENCY RESPONSE PLAN, COORDINATING WITH VARIOUS ENTITIES ON ENVIRONMENTAL ISSUES, AND ATTENDING TRAINING TO DEVELOP ENVIRONMENTAL PROGRAM CAPACITY.   THE AGREEMENT PROVIDES FULL FEDERAL FUNDING IN THE AMOUNT OF $144,823.

awards.recipient_name_raw: CAHTO TRIBE OF THE LAYTONVILLE RANCHERIA
awards.description:
DESCRIPTION:THIS AGREEMENT PROVIDES ASSISTANCE TO CAHTO TRIBE OF THE LAYTONVILLE RANCHERIA TO BUILD ITS CAPACITY TO ADMINISTER MULTI-MEDIA ENVIRONMENTAL PROGRAMS ON INDIAN LANDS.

THIS AGREEMENT PROVIDES FULL FEDERAL FUNDING IN THE AMOUNT OF $192,714.ACTIVITIES:THE RECIPIENT WILL CONDUCT A WASTE AUDIT TO INFORM SOLID WASTE PROGRAM PLANNING, PLAN AND COORDINATE A COMMUNITY EARTH DAY EVENT, AND CONDUCT A BASELINE NEEDS ASSESSMENT FOR AIR QUALITY.SUBRECIPIENT:NO SUBAWARDS ARE INCLUDED IN THIS ASSISTANCE AGREEMENT.OUTCOMES:ANTICIPATED DELIVERABLES AND OUTCOMES INCLUDE RESULTS FROM A WASTE AUDIT, PHOTOS AND A REPORT OF COMMUNITY PARTICIPATION FROM AN EARTH DAY EVENT, AND RESULTS OF AN AIR QUALITY BASELINE NEEDS ASSESSMENT. DIRECT BENEFICIARIES OF THIS PROGRAM ARE THE MEMBERS AND/OR RESIDENTS OF THE CAHTO TRIBE OF THE LAYTONVILLE RANCHERIA.
